products.name: Banana
products.description: Sweet and ripe bananas with a smooth texture. Perfect for a quick and healthy snack.

products.name: Melon
products.description: Juicy and refreshing melons with a hint of sweetness. A delightful addition to summer salads.

products.name: White Bread
products.description: Soft and fluffy white bread that complements any sandwich or breakfast. Freshly baked daily.

products.name: Chicken Breast
products.description: Lean and protein-rich chicken breast. Ideal for grilling or baking. Skinless and boneless.

products.name: Lamb Chops
products.description: Tender and flavorful lamb chops. Perfect for a gourmet dinner. Sourced from premium quality lamb.

products.name: Muffins
products.description: Delicious and freshly baked muffins in various flavors. A delightful treat for breakfast or dessert.

products.name: Potatoes
products.description: Versatile and starchy potatoes suitable for boiling, baking, or frying. Locally sourced for freshness.

products.name: Carrots
products.description: Crunchy and vibrant carrots. Packed with vitamins and perfect for snacking or adding to salads.

products.name: Salmon
products.description: Fresh and high-quality salmon fillet. Rich in omega-3 fatty acids. Ideal for grilling or baking.

products.name: Trout
products.description: Flaky and flavorful trout sourced from pristine waters. Perfect for a gourmet seafood dish.
